38230.name: Before Stojanow Gate
description: (Place a guard here barring entrance to the castle.  No Key to open
gate as of yet.  Coffer outside gate to accept donates for castle
renovations.)

38239.name: Path through Valhingen Graveyard
description: (This is the room that connects to the outside world!)
-==Talla's Superior Armor==-

38222.name: Stojanow Way
description: (Middle Class housing to the south.)

38216.name: Parkside Gate
description: (Don't forget Valhingen!!!  Yay dead things!!)

38243.name: Bane's Black Gardens
description: (Down to Undercroft.  Secret entrance to temple.  Mobs guarding.)

38245.name: Bane's Black Gardens
description: Statue of Bane here.

38213.name: {CM{coonsea {CR{coad{x
description: Moonsea Road comes to its end just south of Podol Plaza,
where it tees with Stojanow Way. Further north, beyond the
plaza, are the northern gates of Phlan which open upon the
Barren River and Valhingen Graveyard,  said to be haunted.
The rickety wooden building to the east seems surprisingly
lively. The words "{DOne Hand Inn{x" have been carved upon the
thick door and painted a cracked and fading black.  To the
south,  Moonsea Road stretches all the way to the docks in
the southern tip of the city.

38247.name: Bane's Black Gardens
description: (mprog at door will not permit anyone of non-evil alignment to enter
the temple.  everyone else has to go the hard way through the back
doors.  kill monsters and stuff.)

38209.name: Stojanow Way
description: (Be sure to mention the housing to the south in the next
three rooms.  And the park to the north.)
-== The Silent Blade ==-

38215.name: Basement of the One Hand Inn
description: (Consider making up not secret and down secret_nobump.  Down goes into
tunnels leading to Kovel Mansion Wine Cellar.)
-==Phlan Training Center==-
Currently Closed

38242.name: Bane's Black Gardens
description: The western gate to the Black Gardens is marked by a huge
wrought iron gate tangled in a large mass of dark vines. It
would be near impossible to peer through the gate without a
brush with the abrasive reddish leaves.  Any amount of skin
contact might cause a rash, so caution is necessary.  Large
circular handles hang from the center of the gate.  A latch
above them seals the door from opposition. To the east, the
huge temple of glistening granite stands,  a stark contrast
to the array of dark flora growing in its wake. A symbol is
carved in the stone marking this temple as Tyr's. It's kept
by the Banites as a sign of their triumph, an arrogant show
of their superiority over the Tyran clergy.
-=)) Council Meeting Hall ((=-

38257.name: Bane's Temple (Vestry)
description: Down to the Undercroft.  Must have some mobs to kill or some such.
Secret entrance into Undercroft from Gardens.
-== Dwarves Finest Arms ==-

38209.name: (unused)~

There is nothing unusual about this man that you can see immediately.
He has several scars from working long years in the mines but that is very common for swarves in this area.

38221.name: Zhi~
description:
The mission's healer Zhi is a frail old man,
complete with grey hair and a long,  braided
grey beard. While his lips rarely curl up or
down to express emotion, his ocean blue eyes
convey a near-constant contentment.
38221.room_name: The passive and pleasant Zhi heals visitors the mission's visitors.
